actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to House Committee on International Relations.
Reported to House from the Committee on Agriculture, H. Rept. 94-1748 (Part I).

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House relative to a study by the Secretary of Agriculture on palm oil imports.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of Agriculture study the impact of the development of the foreign palm oil industry on the domestic vegetable oil industry. Directs the Secretary, if such study justifies, to recommend that the administration negotiate bilateral agreements with the principal palm oil producing countries to provide reasonable restraints against excessive imports of palm oil into the United States.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House relative to a study by the Secretary of Agriculture on palm oil imports.
